messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] the art guy with the curly hair
messages.msgSnippet: Teri, Is it Jon Gnagy? Bridget
messages.messageBody:
Teri,
Is it Jon Gnagy?
Bridget

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] the art guy with the curly hair
messages.msgSnippet: Teri, try this: http://bobross.com/ We love that guy.  I think he died a few years ago. Sandi ... From:  To:
messages.messageBody:
Teri, try this:
http://bobross.com/
We love that guy. I think he died a few years ago.
Sandi
----- Original Message -----
From: <unschoolr2@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, March 31, 2000 6:29 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] the art guy with the curly hair


> Hi all, this is kind of OT, but does anyone know the name of the PBS
artist
> with the curly hair? He is the one who is always painting a "happy" bush
or
> tree.... LOL My DD loves to watch him, but I can't remember his name and I
> need the info for an article I am writing on TV and kids.
> Thanks
> Teri
